select * from t_study,t_question,student,t_depart,t_clazz,t_major where t_study.questionId = t_question.questionId and t_study.stuId=student.stuid and student.departId=t_depart.departId and student.clazzId=t_clazz.clazzId and student.majorId=t_major.majorId and t_study.stuId=#{stuId}
